Package javacheckers.networking

Class DisconnectMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • javacheckers.networking.DisconnectMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public final class DisconnectMessage
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Sent from the client to the host when the client wants to disconnect. Also sent from the host to each client when the host shuts down normally.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      java.lang.String message
      The message associated with the disconnect.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DisconnectMessage​(java.lang.String message)
      Creates a DisconnectMessage containing a given String, which is meant to describe the reason for the disconnection.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • message

        public final java.lang.String message
        The message associated with the disconnect. When the Hub sends disconnects because it is shutting down, the message is "*shutdown*".

    • Constructor Detail

      • DisconnectMessage

        public DisconnectMessage​(java.lang.String message)
        Creates a DisconnectMessage containing a given String, which is meant to describe the reason for the disconnection.
